mapper.select: SELECT a.id,a.c_name,a.j_name,a.e_name,a.nw_name,a.psd,a.lev,a.attribute,a.race,a.atk,a.def,a.pend,a.link,a.img,a.ban,a.desc_nw,a.proprietary,a.hash_code,GROUP_CONCAT(arrow) arrow,GROUP_CONCAT(type) type FROM t_monster a LEFT JOIN t_link_arrow b ON a.hash_code = b.monster_hash INNER JOIN t_type c ON a.hash_code = c.card_hash GROUP BY a.hash_code LIMIT #{start},#{row}
